modName: Snakey the Scaled Saviour Image Pack
summary: All hail to the Hiss! The One Great Snake demands your attention!
descriptionHtml:
This is the only valid mod on the nexus, dedicated to my Lord and Saviour Snakey. I act as His vessel to spread His message, and He wants you to help Him as well.
He has filled the archive He wants you to download with two folders:

[color=blue]modding tools
[/color]
This folder contains various images you may use to appreciate his greatness in the Skyrim nexus hot files. This is what you want to do:

[img]http://i.imgur.com/Xr6c4Zn.jpg[/img]

His Holyness offers various different images for your pleasure.

- A single full Snakey for a single hot file
- Three unnumbered Snakey parts for those that occupy two or more hot file slots
- Six numbered Snakey parts to form a full perfect Snakey throughout the entire nexus main page

All hail to the hiss.
It is written that a Snake of length two or more brings great luck to its architects, for the image of His glory must be spread.

If a Snakey is assembled from at least three parts, The Snakeying is called down upon earth, which will bestow all of his followers with a streak of great fate.

If a perfect Snake is formed, using the numbered images in the correct order, The Perfect Snakeying takes place. Such a thing only happens once per millennium. It is said that The Saviour itself manifests on earth during The Perfect Snakeying, but no one ever witnessed The Perfect Snakeying.

I encourage every modder on the nexus to help make this happen, and I encourage every user to spread this message across the world.

[color=blue]fanart
[/color]
A tasteful collection of art pieces, created by Snakey's loyal following. Unlike false "gods", Snakey encourages the creation of images in His likelyness. Use these to enrich your life, and become a better person under His guidance.

Hail Snakey!
author: T3nd0 guided by His hand
